name: Cultivator
description:
As an inspiring cultist mastermind, you must learn how to control your cultists, manipulate civilians to become a cultist and avert detection of the police investigation. In this quiet town, there are villains scouring the landscape. Convert all the civilians into cultists and begin your cult start-up now.

The cultist mastermind has control over two different phases to achieve their goal. A massive board represents the city, with every character in place, called the influence phase.

Then when the cultist interacts with the civilian, the cultist will try to manipulate their targets to try and initiate them into their cult through the initiation phase.

This game was made as a project for Game Development 1 based on the words:

Initiate

Abandon

Reach

Connect

By:

Logan Graham - Programmer

Joseph Jelinek - Programmer

Jose Luchsinger - Audio/Music

Michael Zahavi - Art

Zhi Zheng - Programmer
